body:
## Steps to Reproduce

Move the cursor to a widget, there's no lightbulb; nothing happens with `Alt+Enter`, and even `Ctrl-Shift-A` can't find any of such action...

## Version info

```
liyuqian@liyuqian:~/flutter/flutter$ flutter doctor -v
[✓] Flutter (Channel doc_url, v1.0.1-pre.3, on Linux, locale en_US.UTF-8)

[✓] Android toolchain - develop for Android devices (Android SDK 27.0.3)

    • Platform android-27, build-tools 27.0.3
    • ANDROID_HOME = /usr/local/google/home/liyuqian/android/Sdk/
    • Java binary at: /opt/android-studio-with-blaze-3.2/jre/bin/java
    • Java version OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_152-release-1136-b06)
    • All Android licenses accepted.

[!] Android Studio (version 3.0)

[✓] IntelliJ IDEA Community Edition (version 2017.3)

    • Flutter plugin version 25.0.1
    • Dart plugin version 173.4700

[✓] IntelliJ IDEA Community Edition (version 2018.1)
```

comment_data.body:
Nope, works for me.
Make sure that Analysis Server works, not dead.
Try to `Restart Dart Analysis Server` in the `Dart Analysis` view.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/384794/49672524-48147d80-fa20-11e8-8668-c6aa009795d5.png)
`Dart Analysis` seems to be working fine as I can still see the format and compile error. I also tried `Restart Dart Analysis Server` but the problem is still there.
@liyuqian can you provide some more detailed repro steps?
I couldn't remember what I did that made them disappear. It happened since several weeks ago. Maybe I can give you the remote desktop access for debugging?
This seems to be fixed in newer versions.

I have the same issue, all menu from Wrap with Widget and switch to relative import are gone. already tried to reinstall android studio but nothing.

https://i.imgur.com/cqaQsKY.png
I am using Visual Studio Code but could be the same issue. When you click on a widget, a yellow lightbulb should appear to the left. If you click on the lightbulb all options should be there.

> I am using Visual Studio Code but could be the same issue. When you click on a widget, a yellow lightbulb should appear to the left. If you click on the lightbulb all options should be there.

was this issue solved as i am also facing the problem

> I have the same issue, all menu from Wrap with Widget and switch to relative import are gone. already tried to reinstall android studio but nothing.
> 
> https://i.imgur.com/cqaQsKY.png

was your issue resolved if yes! then please let me know how

> > I have the same issue, all menu from Wrap with Widget and switch to relative import are gone. already tried to reinstall android studio but nothing.
> > https://i.imgur.com/cqaQsKY.png
> 
> was your issue resolved if yes! then please let me know how

Yes, somehow I clicked something in the context menu and I disabled Dart quick actions. It's in the Android Studio settings somewhere I don't remember.

Go to android studio 
Settings/Intentions/

and make sure

Dart/Quick assist powered by the Dart Analysis Server

is checked


or simply type " Analysis server " in search bar on settings, then click on Intentions And you can find 
Dart/Quick assist powered by the Dart Analysis Server

try This

milestone.description: Issues under consideration for upcoming milestones.
milestone.title: On Deck

title: "wrap with new widget" option disappears from IntelliJ
